item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by A.J. Cronin
item.description: "Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, but only saps today of its strength." -- A.J. Cronin

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Mehmet Murat Ildan
item.description: "A dog can bite you but you must not bite the dog! Your every movement in life must be peaceful; otherwise you lose your ethical superiority! Nonviolent civil disobedience is a genius; no power can beat it; use it when necessary!" -- Mehmet Murat Ildan

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Love is the absence of judgment." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "There is a saying in Tibetan, 'Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.' No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other." -- Dali Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Silence is sometimes the best answer" -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Choose to be optimistic, it feels better." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama
item.description: "Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them." -- Dalai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If a problem is fixable, if a situation is such that you can do something about it, then there is no need to worry. If it's not fixable, then there is no help in worrying. There is no benefit in worrying whatsoever." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "This is my simple religion. No need for temples. No need for complicated philosophy. Your own mind, your own heart is the temple. Your philosophy is simple kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they’re not on your road doesn’t mean they’ve gotten lost." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways--either by losing hope and falling into self-destructive habits, or by using the challenge to find our inner strength." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "If you can cultivate the right attitude, your enemies are your best spiritual teachers because their presence provides you with the opportunity to enhance and develop tolerance, patience and understanding." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by His Holiness the Dalai Lama
item.description: "I believe compassion to be one of the few things we can practice that will bring immediate and long-term happiness to our lives. I’m not talking about the short-term gratification of pleasures like sex, drugs or gambling (though I’m not knocking them), but something that will bring true and lasting happiness. The kind that sticks." -- His Holiness the Dalai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Only the development of compassion and understanding for others can bring us the tranquility and happiness we all seek." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk." -- Dali Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by His Holiness the Dahai Lama
item.description: "Look at children. Of course they may quarrel, but generally speaking they do not harbor ill feelings as much or as long as adults do. Most adults have the advantage of education over children, but what is the use of an education if they show a big smile while hiding negative feelings deep inside? Children dont usually act in such a manner. If they feel angry with someone, they express it, and then it is finished. They can still play with that person the following day." -- His Holiness the Dahai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by His Holiness the Dalai Lama
item.description: "There is only one important point you must keep in your mind and let it be your guide. No matter what people call you, you are just who you are. Keep to this truth. You must ask yourself how is it you want to live your life. We live and we die, this is the truth that we can only face alone. No one can help us, not even the Buddha. So consider carefully, what prevents you from living the way you want to live your life?" -- His Holiness the Dalai Lama

item.title: Limawatanachai add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "World peace must develop from inner peace. Peace is not just mere absence of violence. Peace is, I think, the manifestation of human compassion." -- Dali Lama
